scripts.allure:run:front: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/frontend/*.cy.ts --browser chrome --env allure=true
scripts.allure:run:back: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/backend/*.cy.ts --browser chrome --env allure=true
scripts.cy:allure: rmdir /S /Q allure-results allure-report cypress/screenshots || true && cypress run --env allure=true --browser chrome && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
